content.question: In line 1, rogo des ius Quiritium libertis Antoniae Maximillae is translated

choices.label: at my request you have given the right of Roman citizens to the freedwomen of Antonia Maximilla
I may ask that the right of Roman citizens be a gift from Antonia Maximilla to her freedwomen
I ask that you give the right of Roman citizens to the freedwomen of Antonia Maximilla
Antonia Maximilla asks that the right of Roman citizens be given to her freedwomen

content.answer: I ask that you give the right of Roman citizens to the freedwomen of Antonia Maximilla

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
